name: H.I.D.E. - Hide or Seek Online
description:
What is the Prop Hunt genre? This is a team game where players are divided into Hunters and Objects. The Objective is to hide so that the Hunter does not find it. The task of the Hunter is to find and kill the Object.

Now we have collected all the best of this genre and have created the most interesting game. INSTALL AND SEE FOR YOURSELF. You will not be disappointed with the choice made!

Why choose this game?
1. The game is created by a professional team with a clear understanding of the genre and what players need.
2. New interesting location.
3. Many innovations that are not in other games.
4. Secret prizes and locations.

This game is worth playing. CHOOSE THE BEST GAMES. PLAY WITH PLEASURE!
